channel.title: ♠♥♣Itzscape Rewrite♠♥♣
channel.description:
I Am the creator of Itzscape as known on there as "Kyle" and on Moparscape.org/smf as "Itzkyle" Anyways I have recently shut down the server Itzscape with over 70k Charactor files in the first 4 weeks.
Why did i do this? So that the Itzscape team could have more help in codeing the server since we are rewriting it.
Ok well.. I have decided to start a Community/Development team of a server. Called Itzscape V3 Rewrite. ] I currently have four people working on this project with me so I said what the heck why not let the good people at Mopar Help me.
Ok well heres what will happen. Currently I do have a source and unless someone announces a better one we will be using the one I have chosen (Pimpscape Beta)
Please notice all of the people who apply for JOBS WILL get Super Admin in game HOWEVER! They will NOT be aloud on there Super Admin accounts unless they are testing. Super Admins cannot make trades drop items or KILL ANYONE! THE SERVER WILL not let you. Super Admin accounts are souly for testing ONLY!
All thoese who are accepted will recieve a regular Admin account for in game purposes. Will Have lots of commands but wont be able to trade or drop items.
DEVELOPMENT For the team I will need 20-30 people. Low rep? Dont worry rep doesnt mean anything. Heres the positions we will be Needing
Server Programmer ( Just fixes up and puts things in the correct spot ) Me - -
NPC Drop Tech ( Adds NPC's into Autospawn.cfg and add the drop rates and items with them ) Me - -
Object Tech ( Adds and removes objects in globalObjects ) Me - -
Item.Java Tech ( Adds silabs items into the correct spot into item.java EASY SPOT ) Me Ispy37 (mod joe37) - -
Command Creator (makesitems rarer and also creates command that may be sutiable for the game) Me - -
Forum Designer/Forum Hoster (Invisionfree domain ) Me - -
Clan Choreographer (Helps create aclan stystem) Me - -
Report Abuse Team (All reports will be logged for FTP access ONLY for thoese listed here IMPORTANT JOB ) Me - -
Website Designer ( No-ip domain that will be hoseted on my comp you will only have FTP access to it. ) Me -
Shops.CFG/npchandler.java ( They must add items into shops MUST RUN it by with The TH Team members FIRST! and then they add the talking and what not into npchandler ) Me - -
TH Team ( Brainstorm of Ideas and ask me for my opinion They also are the ones I tell to tell any members what to do This team will BE HANDPICKED BY ME in the first day of running. ) Italia Mafia Me - -
Minigame Tech ( Will think of the mini games AND WRITE A CODE FOR THEM must be done VERY well. ) Me - -
Update Supervisor ( Very easy they just think of updates and how they would go about adding them in. ) Me - - -
Ok that pretty much concluded the Jobs [b]as of now[/b]. I will be adding many more jobs so if there full dont be sad.
Things PLANNING ON DOING WITH TEAM
-Adding Membership ( People will sign up on formsfor membership status)
-Move objects around to create a unique starting area with decent things.
-Seperate places one place for members other for non members
-Members and non members items
-Custom MiniGames see minigame tech job
-Some sort of clan system
-And anti symbol (for names)
-Anti SYI-pkpker or other crashers
-Anti cheat client
Ok thats what I have as of now. This will start up as soon as possible.
Use this to Sign up
[code] Position wanted: Experience in that position: Name in Real life: Age: MSN: Show Proof (no proof = Declined ): Anything else that may help you be accepted:[/code]
[u][i][b]I WONT BE ON UNTI L TOMMROW EVENING BECAUSE OF SKOOL[/b][/i][/u]

Ok i’m back on.

and show proof means just show me some proof so that i know your not lieing

Read full topic
